snippet.title: Barmy Burgers Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, Barmy Burgers. A speccy clone of Burger Time. Levels 1-6 get repeated so this video just shows up to level 6. From the recording originally sent to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ .

Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get in trouble, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
